alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:55AM AKST until January 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW ACROSS THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle. Dry snow will become wetter through the event with central areas of the panhandle changing to freezing rain and rain. For northern areas, it is possible that snow lasts longer into Tuesday morning. Freezing rain may mix in with snow across parts of the central and northern panhandle. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Angoon and Kake. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will warm through the daytime, ultimately resulting in freezing rain and snow becoming rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
